titleHead: Saved appeal application - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Your appeal has been saved

body.para1: You can access your saved appeal application from the email you have just been sent.
body.para2: If you submit your appeal after [mrn-date] you will have to explain why itâ€™s late.
body.para3: Your appeal application will be saved for 6 months.
body.para4: Sign back into your appeal
